title: Replace GPU 9051
message: Need to replace this GPU 9051. I found DC: 1612 and 1630. Somebody tried these datacode? Are they good?

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: This shit is also hopeless. I got some 1516 date codes, but I'm pretty sure they are sanded polished garbage. E-best on Ebay has date code 1001 ones, picture looks good but could still be fakes.

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: I put 11+ last year and now it is back. It works only 7 months.

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: 1612 and 1630 are pretty certainly fakes. Best bet would be the ones E-best is selling now. Make sure to confirm the 1001 date code. Last time they send me 0842 or something and they were remarked and did of course not work. Hopeless.....

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: I just put 1612 and it works, but who knows how many time...

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: Of course it does, they are polished up reballed shit ones. I do not believe a chip that was obsolete in 2011 was made new in 2016, lots of wishful thinking...

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: What do you mean? There are no new chips like 2001 and 751-a2? They are 2008-2009

title: Replace GPU 9051
message:
Do they make 20 year old cars totday?
No! Why? they sell So little you cant have that factor space used up for that. 
Same with these old chips

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: the whole gpu replacement seems like a waste of time and money

title: Replace GPU 9051
message:
Some chips were made new, most were not. 0752001 is a MASSIVE market for. Chips are mostly made for OEM repair, not for stuff we do.
0729051 was only used in a few machines, so why bother making them. Setting up a production line for these again costs 100s of thousands $$.

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: Imac uses only non common chips. Do you think there are any new chips for iMAC?

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: Mostly not, that is why it is so hopeless fixing GPU issues on them.

title: Replace GPU 9051
message:
What about 2025 DC1512. This is one you wrote here that they are new. This is the only one we know?
Never had so many problems replacing GPUs as now with these iMAC. One of them had to replace the GPU 3 times and each time works 1 month. I dont know if there are sense to do that.

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: I have the 1512 2025 chips too. I'm actually not 100% sure if these are really new. They may be very good fakes :(

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: I can confirm the 1630 9051 chips are all fake bullshit. Im going to try the 1010 ones when they arrive.

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: Let me know if the E-best ones work, they are kinda expensive but the rest so far is all garbage.

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: Yes, we should share more if some DC are better then other as we lost a lot of times replacing GPU 3 times in the same Imac.

title: Replace GPU 9051
message:
Golden chipset sell 9051 DC 1514
I think to try one but how? Test with furmark 1 week 168 hours should be enought test??

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: No no no, 2015 chips were probably never made. You are digging for gold. These chips are from 2009-2011 and most real ones will be from that era. Pay E-Best the $50 for it and try that one.

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: How to try that one? What test should I do to test it? Most of them work few weeks or months. Or we have to wait months to try.

title: Replace GPU 9051
message:
Ebest say no new 9051
I just have 2 more imac comes back to me.

216-0729051 DC1630 worked 2 weeks
216-0729051 DC1612 white screen and reboot. I dont know what to do with these gpu...

title: Replace GPU 9051
message: It's your garbage flux! Spend some money on the REAL stuff.
